comment.author: Matthew
comment.text: I'm pretty sure you ran from the rain drops, all while a man returned to his people soon after a threat to his life. #TrumpPence2016 #Notwithher because #Imwithher is not for the American people.

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: You do realize that there was no threat to his life, right?

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: So it turned out, but the point is he continued on in more serious matters, pretty sure just like in past rainy speeches hillary didn't.
